data.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine; it’s lethal.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: One day you'll wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: You are what you believe yourself to be.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: I am I. And I won't subordinate my taste to the unanimous judgment of mankind.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: I do not live for what the world thinks of me, but for what I think of myself.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: The proper function of man is to live, not to exist. I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them. I shall use my time.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: Limited minds can recognize limitations only in others.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable.
data.author: Jillian Michaels

data.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
data.author: Ralph Marston

data.quote: Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try.
data.author: Jack Canfield

data.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
data.author: Beverly Sills
